KmA_app.comment: 5.4 mM when the reaction was initiated by the additon of Pyruvate ; 2.6 mM when the reaction was initiated by the additon of Enzyme

KmB_app.comment: 0.024 mM when the reaction was initiated by the additon of Pyruvate ; 0.0091 mM when the reaction was initiated by the additon of Enzyme

Vmax.comment: purified enzyme preparation, containing 15% Transketolase and 85% Glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase
